file_content.text: Magar! Magar, answer me!
We've been waiting for your all-clear. Are you there? Blasted Imperials!
Who's that? Why would she be calling an Imperial soldier?
If they killed you, Magar, I--I... I've already sworn to hunt down every pus-ridden Emperor lover on this planet....
Hello?
You're not my husband. Why are you answering his comm?
You first. Why are you calling this man?
Who are you?
Oh, blast it. One of us'll have to trust first. You don't sound Imperial.
We just fought a group of Imperial soldiers. One of them was wearing this comm.
There's been some mistake.
If your husband is an Imperial soldier, he's not coming home.
Your husband is dead.
Imperial? Oh, for the love of... Magar, you're too clever for your own good, you old rascal.
I'm Danla Zin, proud Balmorran and member of the resistance against the Empire.
My husband Magar stole an Imperial uniform. He and some friends were trying to get weapons to help us retake our town.
Stole a uniform? They weren't really Imperials?
Free Balmorrans, every one. Did... did anyone survive?
I wish they did.
I'm sorry.
They died in the line of duty.
No.
You go out dressed like an Imperial, you've got to expect friendly fire.
That was a bad plan.
Most of our boys don't shoot without asking who's there!
I'm really sorry, ma'am. I wish there were better words for it. Is there any way we can make it up to you?
You're going to think I'm a cold-hearted old battle-ax, but I've lost my sons, my parents... death's no stranger here.
What we really need are those guns. Magar risked his life to get them. I hate to think he died for nothing.
Can Ord Mantell wait on these codes long enough for a side trip?
Corso, what do you think?
Captain, these men died because of our mistake.
We owe you that much.
We'll get you the guns.
Ma'am, we'll bring you the guns your husband was after, or die trying.
I hope it won't come to that.
Balmorran guns fetch a good price on the open market. Can you match it?
What are they worth to you?
Captain!
We're no refugees! Magar and me had good money stocked away for our retirement. We won't be using it now.
Bring me the guns, and I'll pay fair price for the lot of them.
We're in hiding behind Imperial lines. Magar's comm's got the coordinates.
